column3: Latest;Sihanoukville: CMAC officials have completed the search and retrieval of old artillery shells buried at the site of a new sewage drain near the Total Oil Station in Sangkat 3
column6: according to Maj. Gen. Bour Sothy
column7: deputy chief of the Preah Sihanouk Provincial Police
column8: a total of 117 artillery shells had been found in the area.------Huy Bunleng
